original_text: The person must cut the clay from inside the walls of the house. The person must put the clay from the walls outside the town. The person must put it in a place for things that are not clean.
korean_text: 또 집 안 사방을 긁게 하고 그 긁은 흙을 성 밖 부정한 곳에 쏟아버리게 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: The person must cut the clay
from inside the walls of the house
The person must put the clay from the walls
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 벽에서 나온 흙을 놓아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: for things that are not clean
